task.title: Using Projector to explain software
task.shortdesc: It is very difficult to explain how to use a piece of software to others when they can't see what you are doing step by step. That is why the projector was created, so that multiple people can see the contents of one computer at the same time.

taskbody.context: Below are the steps for using a projector to explain how to use software.

step.cmd: Open up the software that you plan to explain on the computer at the desk across from the entrance door..
Drop down the white screen for the projector.
The software should now be displayed on the projector screen.
The remote for the projector has a laser light that you can use when you want to point out specific things on the screen.
You can teach others step by step how to use the program with everthing displayed on the projector.
